thread.title: ColourPop dropped a new pressed eyeshadow shade after hitting 1 million followers on Facebook
thread.title_full: ColourPop dropped a new pressed eyeshadow shade after hitting 1 million followers on Facebook

author: Bronwyn Isaac
title: ColourPop dropped a new pressed eyeshadow shade after hitting 1 million followers on Facebook
text:
ColourPop dropped a new pressed eyeshadow shade after hitting 1 million followers on Facebook Can you imagine being popular or famous enough to merit 1 million online followers? It sounds overwhelming and mildly terrifying, but if you’re a cosmetic company and not a singular person, it’s exactly the type of milestone you’re working towards. So in celebration, ColourPop is dropping a new eyeshadow in honor of reaching their millionth follower on Facebook.
The newest eyeshadow from ColourPop is appropriately named Milli, and it’s a shimmery golden eyeshadow that visually encapsulates the feeling of being loved by millions of devoted strangers.
MILLI ! Celebrating @colourpopcosmetics 1mill Facebook followers - one of Laura's favorite shades (Laura is Bosslady aka owner of cp!) thanks @colourpopfun for the early swatch #colourpopcult #colourpopcosmetics 
A photo posted by ColourPopCult (@colourpopcult) on Jan 22, 2017 at 10:16am PST 
Apparently, the Milli shade is a personal favorite of the ColourPop founder Laura, who we imagine has the most lavish collection of eyeshadows in the land. Dropping soon: MILLI. A new shadow to commemorate 1 milli followers of @colourpopcosmetics on Facebook! (Deets to be confirmed! But before this has been a gift with purchase on previous mill milestones story in development!!) thank you for the awesome deets @nadzbeautyaddict @1happyislander and @theyneversuspecttheshortone !! pic @colourpopfun ig story! #colourpopcosmetics #colourpopmilli #colourpopcult 
A photo posted by ColourPopCult (@colourpopcult) on Jan 22, 2017 at 5:54am PST 
We would definitely tune into an MTV Cribs episode of the ColourPop founder’s makeup collection!

A photo posted by ColourPop Cosmetics (@colourpopcosmetics) on Jan 22, 2017 at 8:21am PST 
Alongside the celebratory release of Milli , ColourPop will also be releasing a few new pressed eyeshadows in honor of the million follower mark. Will those also channel the golden glory of Milli?
NEW Shade!!! #PressedEyeshadow @colourpopcosmetics For hitting 1 Million!! On Facebook...They are coming out with this shade #Milli it's one of Laura's (CP's Founder) favorite shades. Looks like they are also coming out with new pressed eyeshadows for #ColourPop hitting 4 Million!!! Congrats CP! Definitely a reason for a celebration!! We U! Also in pic some comparison swatches What are your thoughts? ✌ #Trendmood #colourpop #colourpopcosmetics #makeupartist #makeupobsessed #makeup #makeupart #makeuptalk #makeuplover #makeupjunkie #ilovemakeup pic: @colourpopfun THANK U for this gorgeous update: @theyneversuspecttheshortone 
A photo posted by TRENDMOOD (@trendmood1) on Jan 22, 2017 at 10:35am PST 
You can shop the new pressed shadow on ColourPop’s website , and see what other goodies strike your fancy!
